head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths SCHNELLER, MAXWELL R.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths SCHNELLER, MAXWELL R.

block.p: SCHNELLER--Maxwell R., age 99, on Sunday, June 10, 2007. Maxwell R. Schneller of Rockville, MD, formerly of Manhattan, NY. Beloved husband of the late Adeline Schneller; devoted and loving father of Marlene (Bennett) Harte and Joan (Eric) Knight; loving brother of Arnold Schneller and Dorothy Cohen; adored grandfather of Roger W. (Joan) Harte, John Claude (Bonnie) Harte, Jennifer (Rocco) Dormarunno and Regina (Timothy) Donovan; cherished great-grandfather of Amalia, Penina, Joshua, Rachel, Reid and William. Maxwell was a 32nd Degree Mason. Graveside services will be held on Thursday, June 14, 2007, 11am at Mount Sharon Cemetery, Springfield, PA. In lieu of flowers, memorial contributions may be made to Congregation Beth El, Bethesda, MD. Services entrusted to Edward Sagel Funeral Direction, Inc. 1800-217-9403.
